question: Can I get a certificate if I join the course late?
answer:
Use the FAQ context to answer the question.

Context:
You can join late and still get a certificate if you finish the capstone projects. (source: faq2.md)
Docker on Windows can be installed via Docker Desktop. (source: faq3.md)

Question: Can I get a certificate if I join the course late?
Answer: Yes, you can. If you join the course after the certificate has been given to the rest of the students, you can still get a certificate upon completion of the course. If you have any further questions related to this topic please contact the DUCI program coordinator.
context:
You can join late and still get a certificate if you finish the capstone projects. (source: faq2.md)
Docker on Windows can be installed via Docker Desktop. (source: faq3.md)
